07boom3.htm heres just a few reports of booms and lights in the sky of many across the world. well people i have been doing some research on this subject and it seems most of the booms are being caused my ufo craft. there are many witnesses that claim they saw a craft flying low and slow and all of a sudden took off at incredable speed with a flash and tremendious boom noise behind. there has also been reports from argentina of a police officer who was sent out to a rural area to check out some lights in the area and came across a ufo ship in the road with three beings standing next to the ship they took him for a short past a corn field where a very strange creature was eating corn and showed him a few things then brought him back to his motorcycle and when the craft departed he said it flashed or clapped like thunder with a huge boom as it left in the blink of an eye. there many other simular reports so i think most of these mysterious reports of booms maybe those same ships are visiting those areas. what we now need is for someone to setup a video camara to capture one of the ships taking off with the flash and boom on it. then we can show everyone what the cause of this is. hope this helps answer some questions. if you do a google search for booms heard or mysteries lights with booms you will see so many reports that i did not list here. i'll let you know if i came up with any videos. do your own research and see what comes up.
